Package scenario.pov.events

Class ConfirmBlockEvent

java.lang.Object
scenario.pov.events.ConfirmBlockEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Event
public class ConfirmBlockEvent extends Object implements Event
It checks validation of block event in a node.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public boolean actionPerformed(BaseNode hostNode)
      Description copied from interface: Event
      Should be activated by the event host node in order for the event to take action This method should be called in the event host node by calling event.actionPerformed(this)
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface Event
      Parameters:
      hostNode - an instance of the host node in order to perform the event action. Please note that this parameter is of the type BaseNode. Therefore, in order to access the node params and methods, you should down cast the node into your special node class
      Returns:
      True if action was performed successfully. False otherwise

    • logMessage

      public String logMessage()
      Description copied from interface: Event
      This method is used for log purpose. It will be activated by the simulator to log the event during simulation.
      Specified by:
      logMessage in interface Event
      Returns:
      a string that represents the log message of the event.
